definition: medicine/drug/substance used for a specific purpose (e.g. poisoning, explosion, fermenting)/CL:種|种[zhong3],服[fu4],味[wei4]/to poison

sentences.english: MeiXianZu helpless under can only use fan medicine fan pour WangXiaoGong.
sentences.chinese: 梅賢祖無奈之下只能用迷藥迷倒王小紅。

sentences.english: The contents of the images extend like hallucinogen.
sentences.chinese: 圖象的內容如迷藥般蔓延，將它們作成內透式燈箱。

sentences.english: In Dan’s van, Kimberly realizes that Janet has been drugged.
sentences.chinese: 在丹的小貨車裏，金伯利意識到珍妮特被下了迷藥。

definition: to take revenge and wipe out a grudge (idiom)
indirect, psychological method of getting sb to do as one wishes (e.g. questioning whether they are up to the task)
to use public office to avenge private wrongs
to feel guilty as a thief (idiom); to have sth on one's conscience
to die (idiom)/to breathe one's last/to give up the ghost
to take advantage of one's position to bully people (idiom)/to kick people around
drinking party/to go on a binge/to paint the town red
to refute/to demolish (an argument, theory etc)
to die without a burial site/to die a pauper/a tragic end
pinyin: si3 wu2 zang4 shen1 zhi1 di4

definition: to beat sb at their own game (idiom)
